name: UIDropOperation
desc: Operation types that determine how a drag and drop activity resolves when the user drops a drag item.

items.name: case cancel
items.desc: A drop operation type specifying that no data should be transferred, thereby canceling the drag.

items.name: case forbidden
items.desc: A drop operation type specifying that, although a move or copy operation is typically legitimate in this scenario, the drop activity is not allowed.

items.name: case copy
items.desc: A drop operation type specifying that the data represented by the drag items should be copied to the destination view.

items.name: case move
items.desc: A drop operation type specifying that the data represented by the drag items should be moved, not copied.
